methodology:
The anomalies are presented in this indicator as the difference from the 20th Century average (1901-2000). Processed data by year was downloaded in .csv format from http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cag/time-series/global/globe/land_ocean/ytd/12/1880-2013. Result was converted to Fahrenheit.  

Data used are from January 1, 1880 to December 31, 2013. 

Data was accessed on November 1, 2014.
